com.espertech.esper.epl.expression.ops

  • Packages that use com.espertech.esper.epl.expression.ops 
    Package Description
    com.espertech.esper.epl.expression.ops
    Operator expressions.
    com.espertech.esper.epl.join.plan
    Inner join and outer join query planning
    com.espertech.esper.epl.util
    EPL utility classes.
    com.espertech.esper.event.bean
    JavaBean and legacy Java underlying event classes are here.
    com.espertech.esper.metrics.instrumentation
    EPL instrumentation helpers.

    Represents an equals-for-group (= ANY/ALL/SOME (expression list)) comparator in a expression tree.
    ExprEqualsAllAnyNodeForge 
    ExprEqualsNode
    Represents an equals (=, !=, <>, is, is not) comparator in a filter expressiun tree.
    ExprEqualsNodeForge

    ExprEqualsNodeForgeNC

    ExprMathNode
    Represents a simple Math (+/-/divide/*) in a filter expression tree.
    ExprMathNodeForge 
    ExprNewInstanceNode
    Represents the "new Class(...)" operator in an expression tree.
    ExprNewInstanceNodeForge 
    ExprNewStructNode
    Represents the "new {...}" operator in an expression tree.
    ExprNewStructNodeForge 
    ExprOrNode
    Represents an OR expression in a filter expression tree.
    ExprRegexpNode
    Represents the regexp-clause in an expression tree.
    ExprRegexpNodeForge

    Regex-Node Form-1: constant pattern
    ExprRegexpNodeForgeNonconst
